overview:
Sunil Rajaraman is the founder and CEO of Scripted.com, a marketplace for businesses to hire freelance writers. Scripted.com has a pool of 80,000 vetted freelance writers, and ranks as one of the top five largest writer communities on the Internet. Scripted.com currently provides hundreds of businesses with thousands of blog posts, tweets, press releases and articles each month.

Scripted.com’s clients include Levi’s, Viacom, Author Solutions Inc and Healthline. Scripted’s investors include, Crosslink Capital, Liveops Co-Founder Doug Feirstein, Shopzilla CIO Jody Mulkey and Marin Software Board Member Don Hutchinson. Scripted’s advisory board includes former LinkedIn Chief Scientist DJ Patil, Actor/Writer Edward Burns and 99designs Co-Founder Matt Mickiewicz.

Sunil was the 2008 recipient of the Young President’s Organization Scholarship at the UCLA Anderson School of Management and holds a BA in Economics from Claremont McKenna College, where he co-founded the Innovative Startup Scholarship with Traffic Marketplace Co-Founder Adam Altman.
